2023-return-announcement.brief: Liberty JS dates secured October 12th and 13th 2023. Welcome back.
2023-return-announcement.title: Liberty JS Returns in October of 2023

2022-announcement.brief: Due to the uncertainty that has developed with the variants COVID-19, we have decided to postpone our to 2023.
2022-announcement.title: Due to Covid-19: LibertyJS will be postponed again to 2023

2020-announcement.brief: Given the events in the world over the past few months and the uncertainty that will follow, we have decided to postpone our 2020 event to 2021.
2020-announcement.title: Due to Covid-19: LibertyJS will be postponed to 2021

black-lives-matter.brief: LibertyJS and the Philadelphia JavaScript Developers Meetup stand opposed to racism, systemic oppression and the institutions that undergird it.
black-lives-matter.title: Black Lives Matter

2020-our-covid-19-promise.brief: As conference organizers, we want to express that the health of our attendees, volunteers, speakers, and sponsors are of the utmost importance.
2020-our-covid-19-promise.title: Our COVID-19 Promise

2019-post-conf.brief: The LibertyJS organizers want to thank everyone for making the 2019 event an incredible experience!
2019-post-conf.title: 2019 Post Conference Summary

2019-inclusivity.brief: We welcome all to our community and treat each person with respect.  If you are not capable of doing that in return, this is not the right space for you.
2019-inclusivity.title: Community and Respect

2019-sponsors.brief: LibertyJS relies on the contributions of sponsors for us to put on the best possible conference we can.
2019-sponsors.title: Sponsoring LibertyJS

2019-kickoff.brief: We're excited to get started with lots of changes in store!
2019-kickoff.title: Announcing LibertyJS 2019
